== Submissions for Xubuntu's 14.04 default wallpaper set ==

=== Submissions are closed at this point. Thanks for participating! ===
===== Evaluation of submissions in progress... (Wait patiently) =====

<pre> comment
===== Follow the guidelines =====
Please see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers|Community Wallpapers]]</nowiki> for submission guidelines.
Submissions ''must'' adhere to the <nowiki>[[http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/|Creative Commons ShareAlike 3.0]]</nowiki> (CC-BY-SA) license to be considered for use in Xubuntu. Please always specify this license with your submission; this confirms us you are willing to share your submission with that license, have understood the license terms and that it is your work (or correctly attributed). <<BR>> Attached files that are not added to the wikipage (relatively shortly) and thus/or have no author and/or license mentioned will be removed. (Note to submitters: You can check the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Submissions?action=info|history page]]</nowiki> of the wiki to see why your submission was removed.)

===== How to submit =====
If you're not sure how this page works and if you're running into trouble, please <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Submissions/HowTo|go to this place for instructions on how to submit]]</nowiki> your artwork.

===== Accepted submissions =====
All the submissions that fulfil the guidelines will be moved to the page for <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers/Accepted|accepted submissions]]</nowiki>.
